nodes.text: Ardees seeds were a type of seed. Roasted ardees seeds were used by the Ryn species in an ancient recipe for Jawa juice. The Besalisk cook Dexter Jettster asked for this recipe as the only repayment for delivering goods to several Ryn settlers on an unnamed planetoid in the Corporate Sector as it was the best Jawa juice he'd ever tasted and subsequently served it in his diner on the planet of Coruscant.
